SEARCH
Package org.example.model.factory

Class ImageFactory

java.lang.Object
org.example.model.factory.ImageFactory
public class ImageFactory extends Object

ImageFactory.

The ImageFactory class creates an image from a ChaosCanvas object. The class is used to create images that are displayed on the interface.

The color of each pixel is calculated based on the value of the canvas, and the gradient made with the color chosen by the user

Since:
0.3.0
Version:
1.0.0

      public javafx.scene.image.Image createImage(ChaosCanvas canvas)
      Creates an image from a ChaosCanvas object.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the canvas is null.

    • createImage

      public javafx.scene.image.Image createImage(ChaosCanvas canvas, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Creates an image from a ChaosCanvas object with a specified color.
      Parameters:
      canvas - is the canvas to create the image from.
      color - is the color to use for the image.
      Returns:
      the image created from the canvas.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the canvas is null.
